name: Friendzoned
storyline: Amy Belle is a girl that you met earlier in the day, and you've decided to send her a friend request to talk to her more online. After sending few SMS to each other, the interactive story just begins. As soon as you will try to avoid her friend zone, something very sad will happen...
summary: Friendzoned is a texting chat story and SMS game in which you get to communicate with a girl named Amy through text messages and you decide how the story goes. Is it going be a love story? Or is it going to be a pure friendship?
